text:
@realDonaldTrump @fema What the hell is a Military relative to coronavirus?

Learn👏to👏punctuate👏.

So now you have done something approximating your job, I have to assume you tweeted about it so people would praise you?

To quote Gov. Cuomo “... am I supposed to send a bouquet of flowers?”
